children.subject: You should definitely go to the Berkeley International Office and ask an advisor. They have drop-in advising on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday from 10AM-4PM.

From what I remember when I was an international student, they could make exception for last semester. 

However, You should definitely talk to advisors, including college advisor, International Office, and even Office of Registrar, and see how they work this out from there.

history.content: Hi, this is my last semester and I'm currently taking 12 units, which satisfies all my requirements. I was wondering if this causes any issues as an international student, since this is below the 13 unit minimum for L&S. Any help would be appreciated, thank you!
history.subject: 12 units during last semester, as international student (l&s cs)
